title: 4 shot at SW Atlanta apartment complex
content:
ATLANTA (WXIA) -- Atlanta Police were investigating a shooting in southwest Atlanta Monday evening. It happened at the Highbury Court Apartments on Mount Zion Road at about 9:55 p.m.
According to Major Jeff Glazier with the Atlanta Police Department, four people were shot with a shotgun.
Glazier said all four people were transported to the hospital. One of the four was initially listed in critical condition; his condition has been upgraded to stable. The remaining three victims are also in stable condition.
Police said they are looking for one suspect, described as a black male wearing all black clothing. Glazier said the suspect fled the scene on foot.
